example.eg: Adam has an electrically powered car.
He used the sledgehammer with great power, splitting the log with a single blow.
example.egtrans: 他用大力挥着长柄大锤，只一下就把木头劈开了。

example.eg: Although he was a great writer, towards the end his powers waned.
example.egtrans: 虽然他是个伟大的作家，不过到最后江郎才尽了。

example.eg: This battery still has power.
The house lost power for three hours last night.  We had to use candles and couldn't watch TV.
example.egtrans: 昨晚这栋房子停电三小时。我们只得用蜡烛，也没法看电视。

example.eg: That lens has a power of 10x.
The owner of the company has the power to fire any workers if he needs to.
example.egtrans: 如果有必要，这家公司的所有者有权裁退任何员工。

example.eg: After winning the election, the democrats took power.
example.egtrans: 赢得选举后，民主党派开始掌权。

example.eg: The wind powers the electrical generator.
The midfielder powered the winning football team to victory.
example.egtrans: 中场球员使整个团队强大起来，带领他们取得了胜利。

example.eg: The law says that the landlord has the power to evict you from the house if you don't pay the rent.
example.egtrans: 法律规定，如果你不支付房租，那么房东有权将你驱逐出房子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 法律规定的权利, 合法权利

example.eg: He doesn't have the power to lift his arm over his head.
example.egtrans: 他没有力气，手臂举不过头顶。

example.eg: She seems to have the power to make everyone fall in love with her.
This country remains alert to potential threats from other powers.
example.egtrans: 该国依旧警惕其他大国带来的威胁。

example.eg: He is the real power in that government, not the prime minister.
example.egtrans: 那个政府实际的掌权人并非首相，而是他。

example.eg: The army used overwhelming power to defeat the enemy.
example.egtrans: 军队用压倒性的军事力量击败了敌军。

example.eg: In physics, power is a measure of energy transfer during a time period.
example.egtrans: 物理学中，功率是指一段时间内，能量转移的量度。

example.eg: The internal combustion engine creates power for cars.
example.egtrans: 内燃机为汽车提供动力。

example.eg: Two to the power of three (2³) is eight.
May the celestial powers grant you long life!
Most cars are powered by petrol.
